title: Keep keepAlive owner retention stable across suspension and withLifetime composition

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
arc_requirements: keepAlive lowers to an implicit precise-lifetime binding that keeps owner retained through lexical scope end
owner retention remains valid across await suspension and resume boundaries
withLifetime around post-resume use adds and releases its temporary after the protected statement

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
arc_requirements: optimized async lowering preserves keepAlive retention across suspension points
autorelease-pool drains at suspension do not release keepAlive-protected owners early
withLifetime and keepAlive ownership edges remain equivalent to -O0 after optimization
